languages.text: "Я — еретик, {name}". {n}Хейнрикс чуть пожимает плечами и мягко улыбается.{/n} "Странно слышать такое о себе... и все же это мое решение. Довольно жертв во имя Империума. Я отдал долг перед Золотым Троном — теперь я служу тебе".

"I am a heretic, {name}." {n}Heinrix gives a slight shrug, smiling softly.{/n} "It is strange to say and even stranger to hear... but that is my decision. No more sacrifices in the name of the Imperium. I have paid my debt to the Golden Throne — now I serve you."
languages.original_text: "Я — еретик, {name}". {n}Хейнрикс чуть пожимает плечами и мягко улыбается.{/n} "Странно слышать такое о себе... и все же это мое решение. Довольно жертв во имя Империума. Я отдал долг перед Золотым Троном — теперь я служу тебе".

traits.locale_text: "I am a heretic, {name}." {n}Heinrix gives a slight shrug, smiling softly.{/n} "It is strange to say and even stranger to hear... but that is my decision. No more sacrifices in the name of the Imperium. I have paid my debt to the Golden Throne — now I serve you."

"I am a heretic, {name}." {n}Heinrix gives a slight shrug, smiling softly.{/n} "It is strange to say and even stranger to hear... but that is my decision. No more sacrifices in the name of the Imperium. I have paid my debt to the Golden Throne — now I serve you."

"I am a heretic, {name}." {n}Heinrix gives a slight shrug, smiling softly.{/n} "It is strange to say and even stranger to hear... but that is my decision. No more sacrifices in the name of the Imperium. I have paid my debt to the Golden Throne — now I serve you."

"I am a heretic, {name}." {n}Heinrix gives a slight shrug, smiling softly.{/n} "It is strange to say and even stranger to hear... but that is my decision. No more sacrifices in the name of the Imperium. I have paid my debt to the Golden Throne — now I serve you."

languages.text: «Soy un hereje, {name}». {n}Heinrix se encoge de hombros y esboza una leve sonrisa.{/n} «Se me hace raro decirlo, y es aún más raro oírlo... pero es mi decisión. Se acabaron los sacrificios en nombre del Imperium. He saldado mi deuda con el Trono Dorado, y mi sitio ahora está aquí».
languages.original_text: "I am a heretic, {name}." {n}Heinrix gives a slight shrug, smiling softly.{/n} "It is strange to say and even stranger to hear... but that is my decision. No more sacrifices in the name of the Imperium. I have paid my debt to the Golden Throne — now I serve you."

traits.locale_text: «Soy un hereje, {name}». {n}Heinrix se encoge de hombros y esboza una leve sonrisa.{/n} «Se me hace raro decirlo, y es aún más raro oírlo... pero es mi decisión. Se acabaron los sacrificios en nombre del Imperium. He saldado mi deuda con el Trono Dorado, y mi sitio ahora está aquí».

languages.text: 「俺は異端者だ、{name}」{n}ハインリックスは優しく微笑みながらわずかに肩をすくめた。{/n}「自分で言うのも聞くのも不思議な気持ちだが…俺が決めたことだ。これ以上、帝国の名で何かを犠牲にすることはない。俺は黄金の玉座に十分に借りを返した――今後はあなたに仕える」
languages.original_text: "I am a heretic, {name}." {n}Heinrix gives a slight shrug, smiling softly.{/n} "It is strange to say and even stranger to hear... but that is my decision. No more sacrifices in the name of the Imperium. I have paid my debt to the Golden Throne — now I serve you."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は異端者だ、{name}」{n}ハインリックスは優しく微笑みながらわずかに肩をすくめた。{/n}「自分で言うのも聞くのも不思議な気持ちだが…俺が決めたことだ。これ以上、帝国の名で何かを犠牲にすることはない。俺は黄金の玉座に十分に借りを返した――今後はあなたに仕える」

languages.text: “我会成为异端分子，{name}。”{n}海因里希轻轻地耸了耸肩，露出了温柔的微笑。{/n}“这说起来很奇怪，听起来更奇怪……但这就是我的决定，我不打算继续以帝国的名义牺牲了。我已经偿清了我欠黄金王座的债务，现在我要服侍你了。”
languages.original_text: "I am a heretic, {name}." {n}Heinrix gives a slight shrug, smiling softly.{/n} "It is strange to say and even stranger to hear... but that is my decision. No more sacrifices in the name of the Imperium. I have paid my debt to the Golden Throne — now I serve you."

traits.locale_text: “我会成为异端分子，{name}。”{n}海因里希轻轻地耸了耸肩，露出了温柔的微笑。{/n}“这说起来很奇怪，听起来更奇怪……但这就是我的决定，我不打算继续以帝国的名义牺牲了。我已经偿清了我欠黄金王座的债务，现在我要服侍你了。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hausse les épaules en souriant.{/n}« Je suis un hérétique, {name}. C'est étrange d'entendre ces mots sortir de ma bouche... mais telle est ma décision. Finis les sacrifices au nom de l'Imperium. J'ai payé ma dette au Trône d'Or et je suis désormais à votre service. »
languages.original_text: "I am a heretic, {name}." {n}Heinrix gives a slight shrug, smiling softly.{/n} "It is strange to say and even stranger to hear... but that is my decision. No more sacrifices in the name of the Imperium. I have paid my debt to the Golden Throne — now I serve you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hausse les épaules en souriant.{/n}« Je suis un hérétique, {name}. C'est étrange d'entendre ces mots sortir de ma bouche... mais telle est ma décision. Finis les sacrifices au nom de l'Imperium. J'ai payé ma dette au Trône d'Or et je suis désormais à votre service. »

languages.text: "Ich bin ein Ketzer, {name}." {n}Heinrix zuckt leicht mit den Schultern und lächelt sanft.{/n} "Es ist merkwürdig, es zu sagen, und noch merkwürdiger, es zu hören ... doch das ist meine Entscheidung. Keine Opfer mehr im Namen des Imperiums. Ich habe meine Schuld dem Goldenen Thron gegenüber begleichen — nun diene ich Euch."
languages.original_text: "I am a heretic, {name}." {n}Heinrix gives a slight shrug, smiling softly.{/n} "It is strange to say and even stranger to hear... but that is my decision. No more sacrifices in the name of the Imperium. I have paid my debt to the Golden Throne — now I serve you."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin ein Ketzer, {name}." {n}Heinrix zuckt leicht mit den Schultern und lächelt sanft.{/n} "Es ist merkwürdig, es zu sagen, und noch merkwürdiger, es zu hören ... doch das ist meine Entscheidung. Keine Opfer mehr im Namen des Imperiums. Ich habe meine Schuld dem Goldenen Thron gegenüber begleichen — nun diene ich Euch."

languages.original_text: "I am a heretic, ." {n}Heinrix gives a slight shrug, smiling softly.{/n} "It is strange to say and even stranger to hear... but that is my decision. No more sacrifices in the name of the Imperium. I have paid my debt to the Golden Throne — now I serve you."

languages.text: "Kâfir oldum ben {name}." {n}Heinrix, omzunu hafifçe silkip gülümsüyor.{/n} "Söylemesi tuhaf, işitmesi ondan da tuhaf... Ancak kararım budur. İmparatorluk adına feda ettiklerim yetti. Altın Taht'a diyetimi ödedim... Artık senin hizmetindeyim."
languages.original_text: "I am a heretic, {name}." {n}Heinrix gives a slight shrug, smiling softly.{/n} "It is strange to say and even stranger to hear... but that is my decision. No more sacrifices in the name of the Imperium. I have paid my debt to the Golden Throne — now I serve you."

traits.locale_text: "Kâfir oldum ben {name}." {n}Heinrix, omzunu hafifçe silkip gülümsüyor.{/n} "Şunu söylemesi tuhaf, işitmesi ondan da tuhaf... Ancak kararım budur. İmparatorluk adına feda ettiklerim yetti. Altın Taht'a diyetimi ödedim... Şimdi senin hizmetindeyim."
